oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * FROM CD_ODS.BW_TZCUST_AG 
WHERE instr(ZCUST_AG, unistr('\0000'))<= 0
AND instr(TXTSH, unistr('\0000'))<= 0
AND instr(ZAGENCE, unistr('\0000'))<= 0;

SELECT  CALMONTH    
,CALDAY      
,COMP_CODE   
,SALES_DIST  
,PLANT       
,PURCH_ORG   
,PUR_GROUP   
,VENDOR      
,MATERIAL    
,DOCTYPE     
,UNIT        
,ZEA         
,ZKG         
,ZBOX        
,ZBQUAN      
,ZKRWAMT     
,ZSRM_CAMT   
,CURRENCY    
,ZPP_MQTY    
  FROM  CD_ODS.BW_AZEP_O07600_FULL
where calday between '20140101' and '20201231'
